product_name: Burton Darth Vader Grom Snowboard Boots - Boys'
long_description: Give your young shredder Burton Darth Vadar Grom snowboard boots featuring oversize closures and Room-to-Grow footbeds. He'll experience more control and precision than the Millennium Falcon. Dual-zone, oversize rip-and-stick straps are easy for little paws to operate without Mom and Dad's help. Linerless design features Thinsulate(TM) polyester fiber insulation to keep those li'l piggies warm all day long in the snow. EVA Room-to-Grow footbeds allow you to simply remove a layer of the footbed as his feet grow. DynoLite outsoles are soft flexing for solid balance when riding and hiking; ice spikes take hold on ice and snow. Outsole sizing indicators let you see how much space is left before it's time to remove the footbeds.
short_description: Give your young shredder Burton Darth Vadar Grom snowboard boots featuring oversize closures and Room-to-Grow footbeds. He'll experience more control and precision than the Millennium Falcon.
